---
category: news
title: "A prisoner’s dilemma shows AI’s potential to cooperate with humans"
excerpt: "Over a series of moves, the players have to choose between mutual benefit or self-interest. Typically, they prioritise collective gains. Empirical studies consistently show that humans will cooperate to maximise their joint payoff — even if they’re total strangers."
